评论概述: Soft material, room in the right places
评论详情: These carpenter pants have very soft material.  Softer than I was expecting in a work pant.  There is extra material down the fronts but not bulky feeling.  The pair I got had no loose threads and the seams look well stitched.  Most carpenter/construction pants have extra room for kneeling or squatting and these are no exception.  There is ample room without the pants being too bulky or baggy.  Working in a crawlspace or maneuvering in tight areas has been no problem in these.  Definitely recommend if you're active and need tough pants.  Not sure if the material being softer is going to affect their lifespan but I will update the review in a few months.  The only issue I notice is the front "normal" pockets aren't as deep as a regular pair of Wrangler or other brand jeans.  The extra construction pockets are deep enough for small tools but the top front won't really hold a modern smart phone.  The pocket lower on the right leg will hold a phone though.
Comfortable relaxed/ baggy fit carpenter style pant.  Good sewing and quality control.  As advertised and expected.
These are very comfortable pants that fit as expected.
It’s hard to find pants to fit my son and these fit him perfect.  They are a well made, good quality casual pant.  Gap is a good brand and these should last a very long time making them great value.

评论概述: Good Fit, Well Made, Comfortable and Useful
评论详情: Ordered 33Wx32L for a 5'10" 160 lb. adult male. Arrived quickly. Fit is spot on; no complaints. Seems well made, with useful features. Although marketed as casual wear, these were ordered for use as work pants, and were useful for that task. Fabric is sturdy without being overly heavy. Loose enough to make maneuvering easy without becoming easily snagged. Just a bit of stretch helps when bending, kneeling, etc. Pockets hold items well. Zipper is sturdy. One minor gripe: The buttonhole is a bit small, making its use a bit challenging. Coloring is excellent, with a rich, tan tone. Overall a quality pant that's equally at home at work as it is on the town. Pricing seems fair. Recommended.
These utility pants fit to big for me. Although they are my size and I understand they are utility cargo pants. The fit is to big for me.

评论概述: The Fit is True to The Listing's Size
评论详情: Typically, I do not buy pants online unless I know the size and style already. These fit true to their size. I ordered 36x32 and the waste is good and so is the length. The rear, thigh, and leg areas are roomy. So if you like pants that have some room to move, these will please you. As for fashion, it won't win any awards. They are truly Casual Carpenter Pants. One more thing, the "Palomino Brown Global" color is more like a clay brown color to me, which I like.

I liked these pants, but I also found them a little strange.  Being GAP pants, the fabric is good quality, tightly woven, and holds up well to gentle washing. However, it's not constructed like true "work" pants. For example, the fabric is still relatively thin, there's no gusset at the crotch, and the seams are sewn well but not necessarily designed to withstand heavy work. In short, they are not built like Duluth pants. They are built like GAP pants, but *styled* like carpenter pants.  That's fine, of course. You can wear carpenter pants casually and appreciate the value of the extra pocket and the hammer loop, even if you're not planning to wear these on a job site.  Also, I have large thighs, and these fit me comfortably. I appreciate the relaxed fit!  If you're into nicely designed, relaxed fitting pants that look like carpenter pants (but aren't necessarily built for heavy labor), then I think this works really well.

At first, the pants seem very thick; but trust me, you quickly get used to it and it makes other pants feel cheap. Other than the occasional small loose thread, I haven't had any rips or tears over my months of use. The fit is a pretty perfect bridge between baggy and straight and it helps to even out my broad upper body. At 6'2", the 30" pair has to sit fairly low on my waist to fit around my ankles properly and the 32" pair can do so right below my navel

评论概述: Really nice cargo pants. Size is perfect
评论详情: I got the lighter color and, it is perfect for my husband. The size is exactly how it is supposed to be and it looks great in him.

These fit well, true to size, and are comfortable. I like the overall color and look of these pants. They are sewn well, no loose or frayed threads.  The front pockets are short and shallow, my cell phone barely fits and stuff easily falls out of the pockets when I’m seated. The lining of the front pockets is bright white and this shows slightly while wearing the pants detracting from their look. The rear pants pockets are fine.

评论概述: great fit. maybe iron it. very good design and stiching.
评论详情: It's Gap so you know it's gonna be decent design and stiching. The fit is perfect. The fabric is not rough so you won't chafe any skin. The color is also pleasant, vibrant with out being gaudy or bland. I wore it right out the box and obviously it's all wrinkled - but a quick wash and iron and it'll be part of the rotation of path I wear to the office. Very pleased with these pants.

My husband likes these GAP Men's Casual Utility Cargo Carpenter Pant, although the color is a bit odd. The pants have numerous deep pockets and the fabric is soft, but durable. He wears a size 38X30 and these had a perfect relaxed fit. The button closure was a bit difficult for him because he has arthritis in his fingers. These will be great for doing outdoor chores.
These fit well and look amazing on. Plus they are THE GAP!!

评论概述: Standard carpenter pant style. Loose fit.
评论详情: These are pretty standard carpenter pants as far as the design. There is a hammer loop and a couple small side pockets for pencils & measuring tools. The fabric is similar to typical khaki pants. These are not as rugged as other carpenter pants I own. It seems like these are made more for the popular look than for functionality. In my opinion carpenter pants should be made of a more rugged fabric with reinforced knees. Something like duck canvas. These are not. If you like the look of carpenter pants but are not a carpenter then these pants would serve you well. If you plan to work in these, I wouldn't, unless it just for some light painting or something like that. They do look good and fit well. They seem to be a loose fit so the legs are wider than normal and taper slightly toward the ankles.  They fit perfect around the waist. To sum up this review, these do look good and they're very comfortable. Paired with some timbs, a button down shirt and a fitted cap, these would be perfect. Feel free to buy them if you like this style, but I personally wouldn't buy these for hard work situations.

评论概述: Comfy pants at a good price
评论详情: These are comfy carpenters pants in a nice dark khaki color. They fit slightly large for a 32x30. But a good value for the price.

These are high quality Gap store pants. I personally like these type of pants as they can work for actual physical work or look nice for casual wearing. In some cases these can even be used as office pants. I have used them before and I know from experience the quality is good. Glad to have these added to my collection.

The fit is true to size. I like that they are not as tight in the inseam and that the fit is a little baggier. I tried these on before I washed them and they are actually really soft. I love the extra pockets and that they are reinforced. Overall a good pair of pants for work.
